string-array.name: restaurant_populate_queries
string-array.item: INSERT INTO Restaurants (name, location, imageOne, imageTwo, imageThree) VALUES( " 'The Owlery' ", " '118 W 6th St, Bloomington, IN 47404' ", " 'https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/609fcc80e77fe90d7e39d93b/1621997004384-P356MDA2I0GA1OSGSC4O/owl_square+copy.jpg?format=1500w' ", " 'http://indianapublicmedia.org/wpimages/eartheats/2012/04/owlery-4.jpg' ", " 'https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5554e631e4b0b9618acee713/1519655972974-R9EJGNSR8K0R6SXHZ5F0/APT_TheOwleryRestaurant01.jpg?format=500w' ");

INSERT INTO Restaurants (name, location, imageOne, imageTwo, imageThree) VALUES( " 'Social Cantina' ", " '125 N College Ave, Bloomington, IN 47404' ", " 'https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C561BAQFvpBASusSkpw/company-background_10000/0/1534348657751?e=2159024400&v=beta&t=kCPl9xxjxzpglbSQ83WnT_LSw2Z8XYPgAgeOe5AtEE0' ", " 'https://assets.simpleviewinc.com/simpleview/image/upload/crm/bloomington/SocialCantina_7405_edit0-b7fcec655056a36_b7fcee36-5056-a36a-067e80dfb9a01247.jpg' ", " 'https://media-cdn.tripadvisor.com/media/photo-s/18/b3/11/0c/f987d2c5-1dc4-4e92-af7d.jpg' ");
